div.p: The Esther Snyder Community Center allows everyone in the community to take advantage of the resources that are given in this community center. There is a variety of resources, for example, there is a senior center, there is childcare for parents who work and have no one to take care of their kids after work. There is also activites for them to do like boxing and the use of a computer lab. There is also a family center and a skate park. These resources allows the chicano community to make use of them when they need help in anything, from getting a job to having someone take care of their children.

note.placeName: City of Baldwin Park, Esther Snyder Community Center
note.p: Esther Snyder Community Center has resources for anyone to use, it does not target a specific ethnicity, it is opened to anyone who wants to take advantage of their resources.

listBibl.bibl: City of Baldwin Park. Esther Snyder Community Center. 2016. Photograph. Baldwin Park, CA.

figure.note: City of Baldwin Park, 16 Feb. 2016, Courtesy of the City of Baldwin Park, http://www.baldwinpark.com/index.php/recreation/facilities/community-center
